parameters.name: CreateTime
parameters.description: The time when the file system was created. The value must be a UNIX timestamp. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: CrossAccountRoleName
parameters.description: The name of the RAM role that is created within the source Alibaba Cloud account and assigned to the current Alibaba Cloud account to authorize the current Alibaba Cloud account to back up and restore data across Alibaba Cloud accounts.

parameters.name: CrossAccountType
parameters.description:
Specifies whether data is backed up and restored within the same Alibaba Cloud account or across Alibaba Cloud accounts. Valid values:

*   SELF_ACCOUNT: Data is backed up and restored within the same Alibaba Cloud account.
*   CROSS_ACCOUNT: Data is backed up and restored across Alibaba Cloud accounts.

parameters.name: CrossAccountUserId
parameters.description: The ID of the source Alibaba Cloud account that authorizes the current Alibaba Cloud account to back up and restore data across Alibaba Cloud accounts.

parameters.name: FileSystemId
parameters.description: The ID of the file system.
